ygData.subject: Re: Value of lambent stones  and quest items (was AC Dilemma)
ygData.msgSnippet: When I was in Cazic Thule the other day I was waiting on my group to get there. I went over near the Gorilla spawn because that s where I was going to hunt
ygData.messageBody:
When I was in Cazic Thule the other day I was waiting on my group to get there. I went over near the
Gorilla spawn because that's where I was going to hunt with my group.

There was another group there and I role-played asking them if I could loot a mudwater Rune from a
Fanatic if that got one as I needed it to complete a quest.

They rudely said no only if you pay us 100PP for loot rights. I politely left the area and said
thank you but that was to high.

I know the argument of "there killing it, it's there loot." but if you don't need it don't loot it.
Or charge a reasonable price to loot it.

Was it going to kill them to help someone out?

Ranian Aeleroth
Bard of the 21st song.
The Rathe
